You knew it would sink into your clothes as she continued to squeeze your into her foot.

Cata eventually let up the pressure, but continued to drum her toes over your body, and every so often squeeze you back into her foot, forcing the smell deeper into your nostrils. It was a relentless storm of pressure, barely giving your body a chance to reform. Each toe would make sure a portion of your body stayed crushed. As time passed though, the experience began more pleasurable than hurtful. You felt as if you had become one with her socked foot.

Above, Catas show was coming to a close and she stood up to stretch from her long relaxation. Standing on her top toes, you were crushed deeper under the pressure of her whole body. But does Cata remember your underfoot?
15412.title: Crushing De-FEET

info.brief_description: A small squishy boy attempts to survive as a high school theater student.
info.description:
This is a story requested by Moby Mick. He's a pretty good writer, and I liked the idea, so I started this interactive for him.

Main Character's

You are Christian Milon (15): You have a average life, except for only being a foot tall. You enjoy video games, hockey, and theatre. You've never had a true role in theatre due to your size, you usually do voices for certain parts, or people who look good but can't sing. You have been small your entire life but you survived due to your body's ability to be squashed and stretched without taking any real damage. Most of the time you hate being squished, but their are a few occasions where your fine with it. Mostly when it's by your girlfriend.

Abbie Silious (16): Your girlfriend who is a redhead. She also takes part of theatre, she has a great singing voice and has had her share of roles. She does her best not to crush you but most of the time she does at either an accident, or she was tricked by one of your friends

Rebecca (16): Also a redhead in theatre. Rebecca loves to mess with you. Most of the time she puts you in places that Abbie with squish or humiliate you. She has a quick temper though and she has had a share of times when she has abused you herself in ways that you were stuck with her for days.

Ashley (14): A freshman also in theatre you've known for a few years. Ashley loves to play with you, almost every time she sees you she messes with you, unless your already stuck somewhere. The thing Ashley uses you for the most is gum, you've spent weeks in her mouth over the years and she usually gets away with hiding you.

Jessica Milion (33): Your loving mother who has helped you through your life trying to keep things positive for you. She cares a lot about you and dosent squish you unless on accident or if you screwed up majorly.

Payton Milion (16): Payton is your only other family member you have. She cares about you the way a sister does to a brother. She likes to mess with you in some way when she has the chance. She has gone to far sometimes due to your attempts to get back at her. Payton takes part in gymnastics and is one of the best on the team.

Rules:

You can't die but you can be molded into about anything, you can also heat up and become liquid.

Don't make yourself get stuck forever and please make chapters that are readable and longer then three sentences.

Make sure to read all chapters as more characters will be added in them.

If you want to make your own character make sure they are detailed and have some relation to the current characters.

(06/08/2015) If a there's a sudden development that doesn't make any damn sense, or if a chapter is nothing but a sentence long, I will delete the chapter without hesitation. HOWEVER if it's clear that some effort is put into it, I'll simply email you before going over and fixing grammatical or continuity errors.

And most importantly enjoy!
